overview: Rough home video footage from Lollapalooza 1996, which featured headliners Metallica and Soundgarden, along with the Ramones, Devo, Rancid and Screaming Trees. The director and primary subjects are radio contest winners who joined the tour on their own bus, and their antics are interspersed with handheld performance clips.
title: Lollapalooza '96
